subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The public flare-up by Serena Williams during her match against Samantha Stosur was a reminder of the resentments she carries around, just below the surface.
snippet: The public flare-up by Serena Williams during her match against Samantha Stosur was a reminder of the resentments she carries around, just below the surface.
